mapper.insert: insert into pg_type (typname, typnamespace, typowner, typlen, typbyval, typtype, typcategory, typispreferred, typisdefined, typdelim, typrelid, typelem, typarray, typinput, typoutput, typreceive, typsend, typmodin, typmodout, typanalyze, typalign, typstorage, typnotnull, typbasetype, typtypmod, typndims, typcollation, typdefaultbin, typdefault, typacl ) values (#{typname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typnamespace,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typowner,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typlen,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{typbyval,jdbcType=BIT}, #{typtype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{typcategory,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{typispreferred,jdbcType=BIT}, #{typisdefined,jdbcType=BIT}, #{typdelim,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{typrelid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typelem,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typarray,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typinput,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typoutput,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typreceive,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typsend,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typmodin,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typmodout,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typanalyze,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typalign,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{typstorage,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{typnotnull,jdbcType=BIT}, #{typbasetype,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typtypmod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typndims,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{typcollation,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{typdefaultbin,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{typdefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typacl,jdbcType=ARRAY} )
mapper.select: select typname, typnamespace, typowner, typlen, typbyval, typtype, typcategory, typispreferred, typisdefined, typdelim, typrelid, typelem, typarray, typinput, typoutput, typreceive, typsend, typmodin, typmodout, typanalyze, typalign, typstorage, typnotnull, typbasetype, typtypmod, typndims, typcollation, typdefaultbin, typdefault, typacl from pg_type
